title: President Donald J. Trump is Strengthening America’s Cybersecurity Workforce to Secure Our Nation and Promote Prosperity – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
May 2, 2019
America built the internet and shared it with the world; now we will do our part to secure and preserve cyberspace for future generations.
						President Donald J. Trump					STRENGTHENING OUR CYBER WORKFORCE: President Donald J. Trump is supporting a strong cybersecurity workforce to defend our country and promote quality job opportunities.GROWING THE WORKFORCE: Training and hiring cybersecurity workers is vital to protecting our Nation’s defense systems and critical infrastructure.PROTECTING OUR SECURITY: President Trump has committed his Administration to protecting and strengthening our Nation’s cybersecurity.
